comment.author: 93579292@N02
comment._content: so young and so sad. r.i.p. lt. leary

comment.author: 92149915@N08
comment._content: Ernest was the son of Richard & Florence Lucy Leary of Palmerston North as per here He was one of four boys the second eldest of which was Leonard who was born in 1891 and died in 1990 after having served in the New Zealand Army in both the First and Second World Wars as per here He is buried in the St. Pierre Cemetery at Amiens at grave reference V.B.6 as per here It would appear that his mother Florence was a major player in the Women's Suffragette movement in Palmerston North NZ see page 40 onwards of this document a photo of Florence is on page 41
